monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Debuff effects and effects of negative stacks are reduced by 50%.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Acid Hurricane
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 75% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 65% (260%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Aeons
skills.description: At the start of the turn, heal 3% of this Monster's Max HP for every Age stack. (Capped at 7 stacks)

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Armor Shred
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Bubble Burst
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 45% (225%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Burning Heat
skills.description: Every Fire attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Combo Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 30% of Magic value.

skills.name: Corrosion
skills.description: Unique Aura: Armor Break increases the Poison, Burn, Shock and Congeal damage enemies take by 20%.

skills.name: Curse Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects and effects of negative stacks are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Full Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (200 + 30% Magic) Shield target for 4 x (200 + 30% Defense) Removes 6 Debuffs

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Ion Beam
skills.description: 9 x 60% (540%) magical damage (wind) Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Kindle
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mass Restore
skills.description: Heal all for (200 + 70% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (175 + 40% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 50% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Multi Armor Break
skills.description: Aura: Armor Break (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Regeneration
skills.description: Aura: Regeneration (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Preparation
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party starts the combat with a random Buff.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Protected Offense
skills.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Monsters in the party deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Remunerate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 60% chance to gain Regeneration (Buff).

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (50 + 20% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (60 + 25% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (100 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (120 + 25% Magic) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Shared Regeneration
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Regeneration (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Regeneration.

skills.name: Sheltered
skills.description: While under the effect of a Shield, reduce all incoming damage by 15%.

skills.name: Solar Burst
skills.description: 1 x 170% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Solar Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 105% (210%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Solar Burst Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Solar Rays
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Warlock Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Poison, Weakness or Armor Break on a random enemy.

skills.name: Water Affinity
skills.description: Water attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%
